mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MATCH WHERE STATUS IN ('매칭완료', '결제완료', '정산완료', '결제대기')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match (id, member_id, num, amount, adm_comment) VALUES (match_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{num}, #{amount}, #{admComment})
mapper.update: UPDATE match SET member_id=#{memberId}, num=#{num}, amount=#{amount}, adm_comment=#{admComment} WHERE id=#{id}
